resources.string: NVD-Dyslexia
Reading Skills
Spelling Skills
Reading Comprehension
Memory Sequencing
Writing Skills
Does the child frequently confuse or reverse letters, numbers, or words while reading?
Does the child struggle with decoding or sounding out unfamiliar words?
Does the child have difficulty recognizing sight words or frequently forget them
Does the child struggle with handwriting, such as messy or illegible writing?
Does the child have difficulty organizing through and ideas for writing assignments?
Does the child experience challenges with sentence structure, grammar, or punctuation
Does the child frequently misspell words, even after repeated practice?
Does the child have difficult remembering spelling rules or applying them consistently?
Does the child omit or mix up letters or sound when spelling words?
Does the child have difficult understanding and remembering what they have read?
Does the child struggle to make inferences or draw conclusions from reading passages?
Does the child find it challenging to summarize or retell the main points tof a story or text?
Does the child have difficulty remembering and recalling information, such as instructions or sequences of events?
Does the child struggle with remembering and correctly ordering numbers, letters, or steps in a process?
welcome to my Dyslexia Self assessment App
